page.title: 04Mrs D.A Housewife & Mother.
page.content: Mrs D. has 3 children aged 8-13yrs,and lives in Needingworth.She has lived there most of her life but originated from St Ives.She used to work in a bank but left when she had her children. She likes living in the village because it's not too builtup, and she likes her bungalow.She has 4 brothers. She feels there aren't enough facilities in the area but there are in St Ives.She considers that the biggest change is the new housing estates.But this hasn't affected her personally.She likes the present times because people have more freedom and choice.She doesn't like the present unemployment which is causing boredom and could lead to a violent society. Also there's too much misuse of drugs. People seem to want too much in exchanged for too little effort.
